DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hr_compensation_element h left join xbs.option_line o on h.element_type=o.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o0 on h.classification=o0.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o1 on h.category=o1.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o2 on h.calculation_rule=o2.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o3 on h.deduction_rule=o3.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o4 on h.deduction_start_rule=o4.option_line_id left join xbs.user_v u on h.created_by=u.xerp_user_id left join xbs.user_v u0 on h.last_update_by=u0.xerp_user_id
DbDetails.Queryformat: select %{data} from (select h.hr_compensation_element_id from %{dbtable} %{where} GROUP BY h.hr_compensation_element_id ORDER BY h.hr_compensation_element_id) t
